name: swagger-diff

helpMarkdown: ### Compare two Swagger Contracts - left-side and right-side.
author: duy

inputs.name: leftType
inputs.label: Left Document Type:
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether the left-side Swagger document is a file path or Url.

inputs.name: leftFilePath
inputs.label: Left Document File Path:
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file path of the left-side Swagger document.

inputs.name: leftUrl
inputs.label: Left Document Url:
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL of the left-side Swagger document.

inputs.name: rightType
inputs.label: Right Document Type:
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether the right-side Swagger document is a file path or Url.

inputs.name: rightFilePath
inputs.label: Right Document File Path:
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file path of the right-side Swagger document.

inputs.name: rightUrl
inputs.label: Right Document Url:
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL of the right-side Swagger document.

inputs.name: config
inputs.label: Swagger-Diff Configuration Override:
inputs.helpMarkDown: The optional JSON Configuration override for swagger-diff.
